channel.title: [RS2] Autofighter - 3RD script! NoobFighter!
channel.description:
Hello all, this is just my 3rd script, an auto fighter. I started it before there where any autofighter's available on SRL or here, but didn't finish it for awhile. Sdcit released his then Bumis. (I know this is a SRL script but wouldn't know where to begin on adding auto color finding and users, sorry!)
I DO NOT TAKE RESPONSIBILITY FOR LOSS OF ITEMS/DEATHS THAT MAY OCCUR IN THIS SCRIPT.
Anyways, this script HAS been tested, though the anti-random procedure isn't tested, uses SRl. If you plan to use this(take a peak atleast :D), please only use it for 1-4 hours max. On a scale of 10 for detectability I'd give it 5.
Instructions: You MUST have SRL rev 317+, you must start the script LOGGED IN with the setup already done.
Post all bugs here or message me on my msn at: [email]niallcoates@msn.com[/email].
Next version should have support for mages and rangers, possibly forms.
If you have doubt's about me writing this script because some lines have ";" on them and others don't, it's because I don't use ";" at the end of lines but tried to put standards into effect. Sorry about that. :)
